Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataManagerInterface

    public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataManagerInterface
    This class is used to manage both Customer and Order object through the manager classes for each class
    Author:
    Adam Holt
